name: sw-proxy
description: A RFC-compliant HTTP proxy library for service workers.
author: Michael Stillwell <mjs@beebo.org> (https://beebo.org/)

scripts.prepare: tsc -p tsconfig.json --sourceMap -d --module commonjs --outDir dist/commonjs && tsc -p tsconfig.json --sourceMap -d --module es2015 --outDir dist/es2015 && rollup dist/es2015/proxy.js --format iife --name libSwProxy --output dist/browser/sw-proxy.js
scripts.lint: eslint test/*.js && tslint router.ts proxy.ts examples/*.ts
scripts.// examples:build: cd examples ; for f in *.ts ; do rollup -c -f iife -i $f -o `basename $f .ts`.js ; done
scripts.start: $npm_execpath run examples:build && $npm_execpath run examples:docs && http-server -a localhost examples -c-1
